bow: because toddlers this morning my dude had an epic meltdown because his shirt had short sleeves did realize he was so attached to his long sleeve shirts so what weird thing is your toddler upset about right now hahaha you know people always warn you about the terrible twos and crap like that and yeah it true they are emotional little terrors but find *most* of the meltdowns to be pretty funny they usually make for good story if nothing else plus try to live in the moment and realize one day my son will be grown man and ll miss these quirky little toddlerisms put on her socks before her shoes tried to help her put her shoes on know my family have been giving me looks when show them videos of the meltdowns my lo has and in the background cackling maniacally my extreeemely independent almost year old had fit this morning because carried her cereal bowl to the table for her she yelled and cried then proceeded to carry the bowl back to the counter set it down and pick it back up and carried it to the table herself this is not an uncommon type of occurence😁 how dare you that happened to us this morning too before the short sleeve meltdown came into the kitchen and my son was screaming crying at my husband for carrying his cereal bowl my and half year old got mad cos my husband would put both socks on one foot for nursery also the other day she accidentally rolled in gravy her plate was on the floor so took off her jeans as they were absolutely covered and she cried sitting in front of the washing machine waiting for them playdate ended and his friend left so much meltdown it 11 in the morning and ve nursed as many times as did all day yesterday he was so screamy and acting sleepy that put him down for nap almost 20 minutes ago and he still is asleep not screaming but not sleeping time change sucks gt she accidentally rolled in gravy this is the best removed today was not meltdown fortunately he was cheering like champ when told him he could indeed wipe his penis after going to the potty toddlers are weird my kid wanted to know the difference between frost on the ground and frosting did answer her fast enough so she licked the ground and then cried because it had no taste she wanted her hair out of her eyes so started to put it into ponytail apparently she just wanted to keep swiping at her toddler bangs all day long we regularly get the shower meltdowns the why did you put me in the shower meltdown then the subsequent why did you turn off the shower and get me out meltdown they are generally followed by the why wo you dry me more with the hairdryer meltdown then the why are you getting me dressed meltdown my son almost was upset this morning that we put pile of clean undies on top of his favorite minions undies in his drawer mom why did you put these undies like this where are my minions ones want minions calmly explained the situation and showed him that indeed the ones he wanted were in there total meltdown avoided my son had always hated shorts and short sleeves when he was he would scream and fight when he was he would rip the clothes off himself now he and just verbally tells us no do like short sleeves want to wear long sleeves its sensory thing it so interesting he never seemed to have preference until the last month or so figured he was just used to the long sleeves being that it winter but it gets very warm in his daycare building so ve been trying to dress him in short sleeves usually it few minutes of him being upset about the sleeves then he over it and onto different things not putting on the right songs they wo give me the answer have to guess what they want while they meltdown twins how dare he could help but laugh at the fact that she took the time to walk it back to the counter and set it down for millisecond before taking it to the table herself everything sets him off he is kinda of jackass at the moment god forbid say no to anything my son yells no light night night it hilarious because he says what my husband and both wish we could say while getting up it adorable though would let her suck the dirty snow off her boot our shower meltdowns involve screaming do want bath want shower during the whole shower he has had bath since he could stand without wobbling well over year swear he drowned in bathtub in past life or something we spent like an hour and half at the doctor office to get something for what is apparently chest infection this morning he was actually really good for the first 45ish minutes but one and half year old only has so much patience he was very mad that he could poke the computer and medical tools in the patient rooms or pull all the support bandages off the shelf in the pharmacy 22 mos took his shoe and he cried mine put it on his foot he continued to cry mine and reached out to me pointed to his shod foot and explained that gave the shoe back to him unacceptable he ran to dad and cried that mama had his shoe one piece footy pajamas the last two times ve put them on her she had screaming crying fits like the worst meltdowns ve ever seen her had guess she was traumatized by pajamas at some point but do recall her getting pinched by zipper or anything entire posse of stuffed animals must go to bed with her and accompany her in the car on the way to and from school bun uni corn rex tricera tops horsey for mommy horsey little dog and blue bouncy ball also she very afraid of bears despite the fact that we live in very bear free suburb he told me he was done with dinner so took his completely empty plate away sandwiches have bread this upsets to the point where she runs hides and pouts if you try to discuss it with her there was cheese in the mac amp cheese he requested *sigh* my dude is like that with shorts has meltdown first few times put them on him guess it is just so different than pants he gets over it and eventually likes the shorts 16 months old did get her dinner ready fast enough gave her the wrong food she only had spoon meals require at least spoons but is better offered her cheerios had to give her shower after she pooped in the tub would let her climb on the window sill walked into the other room turned off peppa her milk was warm yet do get me started on this one gave her bowl of cereal but would let her eat my cereal mine had milk and she dairy free changed her diaper ever yup every day is shower meltdown around here we alternate showering our two toddlers and all day long they ask who is getting shower tomorrow then one sobs and the other rubs it in that it not him happens every time like it surprise even though we just discussed the same topic an hour ago this morning meltdown by the showeree was rather epic until he got in and started playing with bath toys and blowing bubbles just like they do every time and then all was right with the world same as every other day my daughter always has bath has had shower maybe twice she loves the bath but last night she pooped in the bath so had to have shower you have thought there was needles spraying out of the shower head instead of water not fan of showers snorted she wanted blanket with her in the crib for nap so gave her one she wanted every blanket in her bedroom told her she had to pick one she picked one but still wanted them all you are the worst oh god the last time we went to urgent care the very nice doctor gave my kiddo some apple juice of course had no sippy cup and he demanded he drink from the bottle it came in so of course the trip ended with me mopping up an entire bottle of apple juice from the exam room floor while my son was crying that it was all gone have feeling we ll be dealing with meltdowns over shorts soon too but man ca wait for shorts weather always trying to stop mine from killing himself stop jumping on the furniture stop spinning while standing on the high slide deck at the park please do climb on your not made for climbing toys worst mommy ever she made that abundantly clear with her real tears oh toddlers she said she wanted her light off so turned it off wrong move mom honestly this is awesome my lil girl is very independent as well and when she does things like this it is annoying but deep down inside am proud to see that strength and fire within her my son once got mad because his sleeves were long and therefore mean mean mean mean mean with dissappointed face tugging at his sleeve mine was upset though did have an actual fit about that would give her something with frosting for lunch not even sure what she wanted since we do use lot of frosting cake maybe either way we do have any cake and you could have just that for lunch anyhow ours used to get mad because she wanted the water back um it down the drain kiddo ca really get that back also get out of the tub this so much this she loved her footy pajamas could fall asleep without them until daddy let her sleep one summer night in diaper and tee shirt was sick and he was on baby duty so let it slide now if we even think of pants get an epic meltdown just keep repeating we wear pants in public ca think of nice way to ask this but is it crotch issue my barely turned yrs old had to stop wearing footie jams because even the 5ts were long enough in the torso shame because had stockpiled whole bunch of 4t 5t ones she could wear please do stick your hands in the fan wow you monster luckily luckily we have had too many full on fits lately and knock on wood since this would be the worst week for it anyhow she used to have complete utter meltdowns when we would give her the right color cup for her morning milk we ask get no answer choose one epic fit because we never chose the right one it tastes the same regardless of the color swear seasons weather change is the worst both my kids went through hating long sleeves wearing clothes to bed coats and blankets in the fall then hating short sleeves shorts and no blankets in the spring and the weather here in the midwest is fickle it was 75 one day last week then snow and temps in the teens makes getting the year old ready very challenging hehe she also has wagon for her megabloks but do you dare tell her it wagon she does have word for it but it definitely not wagon and elicits the same response as bread gt it was 75 one day last week then snow and temps in the teens makes getting the year old ready very challenging we must live in similar area my kiddo is absolutely attached to his winter jacket so the other day when we went outside and he did need one ugh meltdown hat and gloves too it used to be fight to have him put them on now ca get them off of him haha yes at least the people here are super nice with nice weather you do feel so bad letting natural consequences kick in if he wants hat and gloves on and its warm wo fight him he ll take them off when he gets hot also used to turn off the heat when my daughter would take her socks and shoes off in the car on the way to daycare cold told you not to take off your socks nothing teaches them better than natural consequences and little help by mom she wanted the letters on her socks on the and the dots on the outside they re fold down socks with dots on the cuff and grippy letters on the outside it an impossible request said abracadabra he cried when we made him come inside because he was crying about being wet and cold from playing in the snow side note this resulted from he refusing to take nap because he wanted to go out and play in the snow her chips were too big being held no wait being put down no wait being put in the sling no wait being held yeah this is my life today messed up he was taking goldfish out of his bowl to fill up the his little thomas cup he wanted bigger cup but the only plastic one have for him is his old thomas sippy cup thought it be safe because he been using straw cups for while now no he had to have his sippy cup filled huge fit he also been upset because wo take him back to his speech therapist he been attempting to say here name all afternoon while waiting at the door with his shoes his sleeve got wet when he washed his hands feel the same my older two girls were never like that and am excited to watch the person she grows into my year old started crying today because his arms were wet in the bathtub anything he does want to do is scary the morning he told me sledding was scary then we get to the hill and he has great time told him it was time to go home and then his house is scary my year old suddenly only wants to wear red cloth diapers we have probably 40 cloth diapers and only one of them is red it caused an epic sob fest at every diaper change oh and he always insists on wearing red shirt if he has on his red diaper and another my year old developed an obsession with bandaids few months back after getting some on his knees at school soon he was requesting them everywhere on non injured body parts push over so gave in and obliged but quickly realized how expensive bandaids were so switched to masking tape on his fake wounds turns out he loves masking tape on his body because now even if he has real injury he cries if you try to use real bandaid instead of masking tape fuckyouimatoddler how could you bought him new snow pants and they had grey on them cheerios cereal it could be thought maybe she was punched by zipper at her grandparents will try next size up and see if it helps wow after reading these comments must now thank the gods that my oldest is the easiest ever unless you re trying to teach him something and my youngest is not
